The problem here is that the refactoring's dialog event loop runs a deferred 
event. There isn't to much refactoring can do since it doesn't generate the 
event. 

Moving to Platform/UI.

Steps to reproduce:

- extract a method that needs parameters
- click on a row in the parameters table
Same problem in the NLS wizard when clicking on a table entry

This is quite a severe bug, the NLS wizard is currently unusable as you can't
change the proposed keys. Also the 'Edit' dialog fails.

Steps to reproduce:
- open the 'externalize stringswizard'
- ckick in the second column
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 61239 ***
*** Bug 61746 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
